issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead

Use of this function is discouraged because resource reflection makes it harder to perform build optimizations and compile-time verification of code. It is much more efficient to retrieve resources by identifier (e.g. `R.foo.bar`) than by name (e.g. `getIdentifier("bar", "foo", null)`).

The intent action `com.shinhan.campung.LOCATION_SHARED (used to send a broadcast)` matches the intent filter of a non-exported receiver, registered via a call to `Context.registerReceiver`, or similar. If you are trying to invoke this specific receiver via the action then you should use `Intent.setPackage(<APPLICATION_ID>)`.
Unnecessary; `SDK_INT` is always >= 26
This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 26. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `OptimizedBitmapFactory` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
